text: @Politidope #Florida is always the "hold my beer" state with inept, Trump butt-kissing leadership, and (sadly) too many people who follow the "we don't need masks" mentality. They still think it is a liberal hoax. Sigh. #coronavirus #DeSantisLies #Floridacoronavirus #TrumpIsNotWell
